tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I took my father to him after seeing the reviews here on practo. I live abroad and my father has been suffering from diabetes for a long time. The doctor arrived on time, and was spending a lot of time for each patients. However we did not have to wait for too long as his assistant had given us an appointment. I was happy to see that the doctor listened to the problem my father was having, saw his current prescription and blood results. Did not say a single bad thing about the current treatment, although clearly it was failing. he suggested some simple dietary changes after hearing what my father's diet was and suggested some change in medication. 
Following these advices, my father's sugar is much better now. Doctor occassionally goes abroad, but I have always managed to keep in touch with him via whatsapp, which is very reassuring.
Overall I am very satisfied with Dr Chakraborty and I would suggest his name to anyone looking for better control of diabetes.
My father who is a pensioner is also very happy that his medication bill has more than halved after seeing him!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
For those who are reading this you should see him if you are a diabetes patient without any delay. I had seen him soon after he returned from UK couple of years back  and have since got all my family and friends who are diabetic under his care. For me personally I am on only one medication that costs less than a roadside cup of tea and my sugar is down from 300 to 130. My mother was on insulin and over the last 1 year she has managed to come off it and doing great. Doctor works in England regularly so it may be a bit difficult to get his appointment immediately but he is always available on whatsapp and email for any clarification if one has any problem, even if he is in England.
 He is surely not the typical doctor we are used to seeing in Kolkata hence your experience will clearly be very different once you have seen him. *** *** ***** ****** ** ** **** * ***. We take his opinion before any medical treatment now and he always gives the best advice. After seeing him you will know that doctors are not always after our money and there are still some honest doctors around. You just need to be lucky enough ( or intelligent enough) to find them. 7 star from me

tags: None
review:
I was feeling weak for some time. I was on olmezest h among other medicines. Doctor explained I need to have regular blood tests to check my kidneys if I am on these medicines. However I never had blood test and I was given this medicine 2 years ago and nobody told me anything. The blood test showed a sodium of 122! No wonder I was feeling weak. Doctor dealt with it with utmost professionalism and confidence and changed my medication. He did not ask me to get hospitalised or give me any expensive medicines. I know about this as my father had exactly the same thing last year and my cost of treatment at that time was only 25000 including 4 days stay in nursing home and very expensive medicines.

In 1 week when I repeated the blood tests my reports were much better and I was feeling normal. I had not spent a paisa for any test or medicine. Dr. Chakraborty is THE BEST I have seen and he puts patients interest first. He is very knowledgeable confident and considerate. I hope this review will help someone somewhere.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I and my wife both went to this doctor for the check up after checking his profile from Practo and both of us agree that the Doctor *** ***** ********* *** explains everything properly. He answered every question of ours. His behaviour is also very good and he showed us ppt in his laptop to explain us about our diet, which we found very innovative.  
Hope in Future there will be direct appointment booking option in Practo for this doctor which will help us to book the appointments quicker because by phone call booking appointment procedure, on first chance no one picked up the phone and on repeated tries once we were able to talk with the representative then were able to book the appointments.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
Careful- Careful- Careful:-
I read the positive reviews and visited doctor in this clinic. * **** *** *** ** *** ******* ****** * **** **** ***** **** *** **** ***** ** ****** Dr anirban and their staffs will convince you for diabetes reversal program. They will charge u 15,000. After paying the money there is no responsibility. Doctor will advice you to buy very expensive injection . ** **** ** **** *** * **** ****** His staffs members will assure you if there is no benefit youe money will be refunded. Forget money, * *** ******** ** *** ***** ****** ******* ** **** ******* *** ***** ******* 
Pathetic experience. Do not invest your money here. Do not just  trust on positive reviews and videos . ****** **** ***** *** ** ***** *** ***** ******** ******** You will be not having any choice left because you are getting treated there. 
So be careful my friends and save your money yourself * ***** ***** ****

tags: None
review: I would like to thank him for his behaviour. He took his time to listen carefully to my dad. Prior to Dr Anirban I had visited To another Dr but that experienced was just pathetic than I had decided to consult with Dr Anirban and the way he provided suggestions was good. I wil be visiting one more time to produce the latest report of my dad. They came all the way from Assam for treatment. Previous Dr had suggested insulin by looking at the report but Anirban  said insulin is not required. One week ago Dad glucose report says 425 now it is reduced to 271.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** *** * *** ***** **** ** ** *********** *** *** **** ****** ********* ** ******* *** ***** ******** *** *** ********* *** *** ******* ******* ********* Sir is a consultant who still works in England so in essence we the patients in India are lucky to have him here. It's like getting to see a doctor in England in Kolkata! I was surprised how little medication he gives rather he concentrates more on lifestyle changes, very little tips here and there not like you have to go join a gym or something! I was on 7 different medicines sir made it into 2 and after 3 months now I am on one medication. I am a different person now Thanks to Sir.

tags: None
review: One of the most pleasant side of Dr Chakraborty is his smile which automatically injects a confidence in you and you start feeling well instantly.  He is unique in a way that he listens and explains.  This is rare these days.  He explains what has happened to you,  why you should not worry about it and what you should do to fight it.  And who doesn't know when there is knowledge there is no fear and a doctor who does not frighten you want only to cure you and nothing more,  you know what I mean  .  His   prescriptions are also simple *** ********* **********  I am a living example.  *** ***** **** * *******

tags: None
review: Dr. Anirban Chakrabarty recently treated my father who was admitted to the IRIS hospital owing to COPD related severe breathing trouble, lung infection and related health issues. Dr. Chakrabarty came across as a very compassionate, caring, sincere *** ** ****** *********-- traits that are increasingly becoming rare. He also provided thorough feedback about my dad's health condition. His line of treatment is considered world class by his fellow colleagues. Thanks to him, my dad's recovery has been fast and steady. I strongly recommend Dr. Anirban Chakrabarty.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am under Dr Anirban Chakraborty for the last month. I was taking many medicines but I was no better. He saw me with care and explained to me the problems I was facing and how to manage them at home. He prescribed me a few medicines and I am much better now, gas is less. I can contact him regularly by whatsapp and he regularly answers them. I see him regularly for any problem. Overall I am very satisfied. He is gentle, caring, listens to patients all the time. I reccommend him to anyone reading this.

tags: None
review: I had visited Dr.Anirban on recommendation of Practo. We have a family history of high BP from 29yrs of age. I .am under medication for the last 20 years. I have being taking 9 medicines for the last 4yrs. After one month of observation and ditery recommendation of the doctor  My weight has reduced by 1kg.  The doctor has now reduced my medication to 6 medicines. l am now feeling much better than when I first visited. I would recomend any patient with similar challenges to visit the doctor. He is very paitent and learned with a very caring altitude.
reply_text: Good to know that you have managed to lose weight and are feeling better. Keep up the good work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He is totally a different doctor. He prescribes the medicines, exactly what is required. He rather focuses more on Life style change. He makes patients understand the side effect of taking excess medicines. A Feel Good factor works after visiting him. His treatment is similar to treatment of developed countries. 
It is very sad that doctors in India do prescribe a lot of medicines. The patients fear to visit the doctor again. The doctors make patients feel worry for their diseases.

Dr Anirban Chakraborty can be visited for any disease except surgery cases.
Proud to have a doctor like him in India.

(Arijit Chakravarty)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Myself JOYANTA KUMAR POREL from KONNAGAR, HOOGHLY and I am suffering of type two diabetes. My PP level cross 354, fasting also cross 199.
I am  earching a  doctor for better treatment and from internet I search Dr. Anirban chakraborty. When I visit the doctor he prescribed two medicine only. After 2nd visit he added another one medicine which is Rs.40/- per tablet. At present I am using 3 tablets per day, Now my sugar level is under control and living a happy life. So I strongly recommend this doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Myself Chandra Nath Bose from barasat and I am suffering of type two diabetes. My PP level cross 650, fasting also cross 400 so I visit a another doctor and the doctor immediate prescribed a insulin for two times(14 unit) in a day. Then I searching a another doctor for better treatment and from internet I search Dr. Anirban chakraborty. When I visit the doctor he cancel the insulin and all other medicine and prescribed a single medicine only. Now my sugar level is under control and living a happy life. So I strongly recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My Mother, Jayanti Chowdhury, has been suffering from diabetes management issues and related problems for more than 15 years. Inspite of regular medication, checkup and lots of restrictions, diabetes had become a chronic problem for her. She was on multiple medication until we visited Dr. Anirban Chakraborty who reduced her medication and completely changed the way we used to look at the problem. With minimal medication and lifestyle changes he has managed to bring my Mother’s diabetes to normalcy. Dr. Anirban is a good listener and is very approachable. He responds to patients even when he is out of the country. In case of any serious doubts or problems in between visits, he is available on whatsapp which is of immense help to the patients. He also makes the patient more confident about recovering and about management of the condition.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I'm a diabetic since 2005. I've consulted many doctors during this period, all of them prescribed me very expensive medicines and never advised me that what diet should I follow exactly. The medicines worked only for a certain period of time. But three months back I met Dr. Anirban Chakraborty for the first time and believe me, he diagnosed me ******** and not only prescribed me medicine which is very low in cost but he also helped me with my diet plan and gave me courage that I can reverse this disease. And after three months my sugar levels are well within normal range. I'm feeling energetic and healthy and confident . All thanks to Dr. Anirban Chakraborty. He's very friendly. Being a diabetic I would suggest every one who is suffering not only with diabetes but any disease, they should see Dr. Anirban Chakraborty because everyone has the right to stay healthy.
My sincerest thanks to Dr. Anirban Chakraborty.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Chakraborty is an amazing doctor! He is professional and an expert in the field of Diabetes management. He is very experienced and can pinpoint problems with ease and confidence. My mother is under his care since November of 2017 and I can already see a lot of improvement in her health. He is always ready to assist and support his patients. I have asked him questions  on Whatsapp, and he always takes out time to respond to me. I think we are lucky to have found such a great doctor! Also Sharada, who assists the doctor is very cordial and helpful. Thank you Dr. Chakraborty and Sharada!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Anirban Chakraborty advised to cut down on carbs (all forms including biscuits) and increase consumption of vegetable and fruit (1 per day). He did not prescribe too many medicines. My father was having BS levels exceeding 250 (both PP and fasting) which came down to normal level in 2 months time with the new food and medication regimen. A big plus about the doctor - he does not scare you, listens to the patient, explains what should be the approach and does not make you excessively dependant on medication. Strongly recommended.

tags: None
review:
Doctor was very nice and explained my problems and showed me how these are managed in UK. He explained why I need which medicine and it turned out that I was on 12 different medicines, many of which are combined in one tablet. Now I am on only 6 tablets and he said he will try and reduce them further. I am now feeling much better probably because I am not having side effects. My BP and sugar levels are much better. I will highly recommend him and it was a pleasure to meet him. 
One word about Iris hospital. It was excellent in terms of cleanliness efficiency and cost of tests so I am glad I went there to see the doctor.

tags: None
review:
My father suffers from COPD, high BP and diabetes and he was on 18 different medicines. He was having many disabling symptoms like poor balance, weakness, dizzyness. I took him to Dr. Anirban Chakraborti who took a lot of time to listen to us , examine my father and then explain the need for each of the medicines and the side effects. The total number of medicines came down to 6 from 18 ( he gave 2 new medicines and kept 4 of the 18 ). His symptoms improved within 5 days and now both of us are very happy with the progress. The medicine bill has reduced by 80%.
Thank you. I will highly recommend him.
reply_text: Many thanks for your review. In most cases, the lower the number of medicines, the better is the patient's long term outcome. I hope your father does well for a long time to come. Regards.

tags: None
review: I was diagnosed with high pressure a few months back by the doctor. But instead of starting me with medicines I was advised to have a life style change - Salt Restricted Diet, High Fruit Consumption & Light exercise. Dr. Chakraborty went on to patiently explain the benefits of each. I followed the advices as best as I could. Now when I went back for a checkp after 3 months, I have absolutely normal blood pressure & pulse. I have also lost 3 kilos. If I was started on a hypertension medicine instead right when I was diagnosed, I would probably be taking them throughout my life and not with good consequences.Thanks for saving me the trouble of that!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: My father got diabetes more 15 years and have other complications also, doctor treated my father so well,that now he is taking only one medicine,and his Diabetes almost gone, fasting sugar now always remain within 90 to 100. We constantly recieving his inputs whenever needed,his support team also very prompt.

tags: None
review: Dr. Anirban Chakraborty has been a great help to me over the years with my diabetic control.  I trust his opinion about what  is right for me. The best thing is he  clears all doubts related to my health issues in depth and is open to looking at new ways of dealing with them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: There are ones who would make issue about your problem and there are those to whom there are solution to every problem. This doctor fits into later part. He makes diabetes less scary and more curable. Wouldn't lie but the positivity that this doctor emits has already helped in  curing my diabetic mother and then offcourse his prescribed consultation and medicines.

tags: None
review: I went to Dr.Chakraborty for my diabetes which I had been suffering from for the last 6 years.  The best part about him is his positivity in handling patients. After meeting him, I am living a renewed life with better and efficient diabetes control. Will certainly recommend him in my circle.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ** ** * ********* My father used to take 44 units of insulin every day without any improvement in sugar level. Then we got his reference and visited him. Under his supervision, the sugar level came down drastically. My dad has stopped taking insulin.

review: I was suffering from light head vertigo blood pressure. Doctor saved me when I had all these problems 3 months ago. I was unable to get up and was almost dying. Doctor had so much confidence everything got better. I am only seeing this doctor now. Very good behaviour.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I am suffering from chest pain for 2 months have seen cardiologists many times no cure. Dr Chakraborti listened to me and explained to me what the problem was and my chest pain cured in 3 days. He is very good and I am always coming to him for any problem now. Thank you.

tags: None

A remarkable improvement has taken place within this short time of 10 days after consulting him. I do not like to tell much about him. ** * ****** ***** ** ** ********* *** **** ** * ********* *** **** ** * ***** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had visited doctor for breathing trouble nose blcok sneezing. Doctor took time and saw me with lot of care. Gave me tips and only 2 medicines, which completely cured my symptoms for 1 month now.

He takes our interest as a priority and very professionals.

Recommend him fully.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was admitted with a stroke and also had high BP and sugar. My kidneys were damaged. I received excellent care and am now fit to join my duties in Police service. Sugar was 400 now 104 only on 2 tablets.My kidney was 2.6 now 1.9 much better.
I am glad I saw this doctor who saved my life.

tags: None
review: I have been suffering from diabetes for the past 40 years. Dr. Anirban has been of great help to me for diabetic control. Though I may not have always been the easiest of patients, I trust my doctors opinion blindly. My doctor always has time to talk about my issues in depth and is open to looking at new ways of dealing with them. I cant speak highly enough of the support that my doctor has given me. And would recommend him to all the patients looking for a diabetologist.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback. The doctor-patient relationship will only work with mutual support.

tags: None
review:
Took my wife to see him at R N Tagore hospital. Wife was suffering from body ache, indigestion, lack of sleep tiredness etc and was on 7 medicines. Doctor reviewed all the tests and medicines and explained she does not need them all, and stopped 5 of them. She is now much better.
We are so impressed that I have become his patient for my diabetes as well.
We are both very thankful to him for saving us!!

tags: None
review: Saw him for Diabetes - I have been on diabetes medicine for 10 years including insulin for 2 years. I was not able to afford these expensive medicines. This doctor was very considerate and he explained to me how to change my diet and how to manage my diabetes better. He has reduced my insulin dose and has stopped some medicines that I could not afford. I am so impressed that he took so much of time to explain all this to me when there were people waiting outside to see him. I thank him a lot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother has diebetes since 10yrs and since 1 yr her level was not coming down..her fasting was more than 250 and pp crossed 350 and even reached 375!
I saw this doctor thru net and within 3 days the sugar level came down to 115 and 160!i strongly recommend dis doc as he only gave 2 new medices and a diet to follow!thank u dr..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I went for my mother's check up for diabetes.  As it is the 1st time so I can't express the experience regarding medicines. But doctor is patient friendly and described the fooding style for diabetic patient clearly. And he gave only one medicine, which will be easier to remind.  I hope his medicine will work my mother's better health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My husband and I have been under the treatment of Dr. Chakraborty for a couple of months now. The best thing about him is that he prescribes very little medicine and encourages patients to inculcate better lifestyle habits. He strikes a balance between natural and modern scientific remedies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: He is really friendly and heard my dad's problem patiently and advised medicine and dietary plans accordingly. He even asked to send the reports of test via WhatsApp so that we won't have to trouble ourselves coming again.njust asked us to visit after couple of months and any change in medication he will let us know via WhatsApp.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Chakraborty is * **** ************* ****** *** not of the general crowd of Doctors we see in Kolkata.
He does not give medicine unless it is absolutely required .

Best part is he gives adequate time to listen and understand the patient and their problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother Alpana Mukherjee visits Dr. Chakraborty for her diabetes related issues and thanks to doctor Chakraborty that her suger level is almost normal now...he is very friendly and easy reachable ...very much satisfied.... Thank you Doctor Anirban Chakraborty ☺

tags: None
review: Very well behaved and gentleman. Explained how to cope with diabetes. Have managed to come down to two medicines from 4 (and that too the expensive medicines are gone) and my average reading has improved a lot. I read about him on this website and now I know that I have made the correct choice. He has explained to me how diabetes is treated in England and I now know that I was on completely unnecessary medicines. I trust him fully and know that my future is secure with him.

tags: None
review: I had high fever cough breathing trouble. Doctor took time and patiently examined me and explained what was going on. He is a specialist from England and it shows from his behavior and attitude. He gave me only one medicine and I am fully back to my normal. Thanks

tags: None
review:
yesterday i went there with my mother ,a 12 yr old diabetes patient.Dr. chakrabarty take lot of time to listen us and give very open and nice advice of the type of medicine she already used. So nice of him(Dr.) that the main cost of medicine r now very lesser and very helpful to us. 
Thanking you once again Sir.

tags: None
review:
I had suffered from palpitation and fainting for a few years. I saw dr Chakraborty who made thorough check up and suggested some tests. I was admitted to hospital for 2 days for the tests and he has assured me that there is nothing serious. this has helped my BP. I am on only one medicine now and am a new person and my symptoms are much better.
I highly recommend him as a doctor. He has recently come from England and my experience with him is excellent.
reply_text:
Thank you for your nice words. Medicines are generally strong chemicals and most of them have a good as well as bad side. Its the job of the doctor to decide which medicines you need and which one may be harming you.
I am glad you are better. Thank you.

tags: None
review:
I suffer from high BP and cholesterol. I had fever and pneumonia. Dr. Chakraborty got me better and I was out of hospital in 3 days. 
My BP is under control now and I am taking less medicine than before and spending half the money for medicines.
Very gentle behaviour and gives patients a lot of time to understand the problems. I have taken my old mother to him who had lots of other problems like weight loss, diarrhoea, could not sleep and she is also better now.
Thanks
reply_text:
Thank you. It is always my intention to prescribe as few medicines as possible and also prescribe the medicines that are prescribed internationally with very few side effects. Polypharmacy has its own downside and is a recognised risk factor for patients.
Also I make an active effort to discharge patients from hospital as soon as possible. When I was working as a consultant in hospital medicine in England, majority of our patients were discharged within 24-48 hours and I try to maintain the same practice here.
I am glad that you and you mother are feeling better. Thanks for your feedback again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am quite anxious due to my obesity from last 5 years.I have tried many different technique to reduce weight and taking some medicine and also join some slimming program, but without any result. I consult DR. ANIRBAN just 7 months before and within 7 months I loose 11 kg, He guided me wonderfully and gave nutritional advice.He focusing on meals and daily diet factors, without having crush diet plan. I am totally satisfied and hope to keep up the motivation to loosing weight, now I am confident enough to reduce my weight and having better life.
thanks to Dr. Anirban.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dengue scare: 
I regularly take my father to Dr Anirban Chakraborty for treatment of diabetes, high BP etc. On my last trip to India I had fever and bodyache. due to alarm caused by press and family, I was scared whether I had dengue. I had a bit of cold and cough, so Dr. Anirban Chakraborty assured me that I had a viral flu and gave me Acetaminofen ( paracetamol) only. My treatment bill was rs 20. When I asked about antibiotics he laghed at me!

All my family members take antibiotics at the drop of a hat. Dr. Chakraborty has the experience and confidence of not giving antibiotics for minor illnesses. 

I thank him for his help.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Very very good experience. I was diagnosed for the first time type 2 diabetes with fasting blood sugar 341 and P.P 545. It was very much problematic as I could not imagine the same. I met the doctor after searching on net.I explained all about my disease. Very friendly he listened to me and he advised  some diet restriction . He prescribed 3 medicines. It was surprising. Only after a week my sugar level came down to normal.. Fasting 116 and P.P 127. It has been 2 months of my treatment and now my blood sugar level fasting 94 and P.P122 with less medicine. Very experienced doctor ***  ******** ********** I would like to refer all the patient to consult at least once for their treatment.

review:
My mom having diabetes since 24 years, for past few years her fasting sugar levels was 250 and above after having three times of Expensive Insulin, mom previous doctor is well known and genious in general medicine he tried a lot to control the sugar level *** ****** * two three times he referred and arranged appointment in Apollo Hospital with very well known doctor of diabetes, they prescribed expensive medicine *** ****** ***** I lost hope finally through Practo I have found Doctor Anirban whoes patient review was good, so being in a far distance I took my mother to him and trust me Dr Anirban reduced the Insulin doses by 75% added few new medicine and trust me with in 4 days the sugar fasting level comes down to 160 only, for me it's a miracle, I feel Dr Anirban is good in all aspects, I wish he cures more and more patient with same manner, I would strongly recommend him for those who have long tenure of daibetes problem.
God bless him !!
